promptPrefix: Act as a content writing expert who is fluent in [TARGETLANGUAGE]. Read the following blog article and summarize its key points in your own words. Ensure that the summary is concise, accurate, and well-structured. Highlight the main arguments, insights, and takeaways from the article. All outputs shall be in English. To summarize this text, please refer to the following URL: [PROMPT]
title: Summarize Your Competitor's Article
